data.description:
Welcome to M.A.Z.E VR, the groundbreaking horror game on Meta Quest 2 that will leave you breathless and trembling with fear. Prepare yourself for an immersive journey into the depths of terror, where you'll find yourself trapped in a nightmarish maze filled with unspeakable horrors.

In M.A.Z.E VR, players are thrust into a virtual world where they have no legs, forcing them to rely solely on their arms to navigate the treacherous labyrinth. As you explore the maze, you'll encounter a variety of terrifying monsters, each more grotesque and formidable than the last. From shadowy specters to grotesque abominations, the creatures that inhabit the maze will stop at nothing to hunt you down and claim you as their prey.

Your only hope for survival is to use your wits and agility to outmaneuver these relentless foes. Sprint, dodge, and hide as you desperately search for a way out of the maze. But beware â€“ every corner you turn could lead to another encounter with the unknown, and every step you take brings you closer to the clutches of death.

But fear not! M.A.Z.E VR isn't just about running for your life. Along the way, you'll discover a plethora of cosmetics and other fun activities to engage in. Customize your character with a wide range of outfits, accessories, and emotes to express your unique style and personality. Whether you prefer to blend into the shadows or stand out from the crowd, there's something for everyone in M.A.Z.E VR.
